title: Hot potato salad with  dill-pickled onions

ingredients.item: 2 red onions, halved and finely sliced
20g pack dill, leaves only, finely chopped

instructions.step: Cook the potatoes in a large pan of boiling salted water for 15-20 minutes until just tender. In a small bowl, pour boiling water over the red onions, stand for 2Â minutes, then drain. Mix with the lemon juice, half the dill, sugar and seasoning, and set aside.
In a separate bowl, mix the soured cream with the remaining dill, mustard, olive oil and vinegar, and season.
Drain the potatoes and tip into a bowl. Toss with the dressing while hot. Mix in the salad onions and serve with the pickled red onions over the top.
